name: Chimeress
description:
A scornful sea-beast sights a ship and spurns its sinking to her domain...

...so she saves it.

A short exploration/adventure game, roughly 10 minutes.

Pronounced "kai-mare-ess".

Desktop (Keyboard) Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move

J - Interact/Accept

If you're having trouble getting the game to register input on a desktop, make sure you've clicked on the game itself recently. If you click away from it your inputs won't be directed there anymore.

Downloading the Rom

If you'd like to download the rom file to play on your device, keep in mind that it's *not* an executable, but needs an emulator capable of running Gameboy or Gameboy Color roms. You can download one of these for free through a quick Google search. I've heard people really like MyOldBoy, and I personally use bgb. 

If you're confused, think of a rom as the game itself and an emulator as the game system used to play it-- digital versions of a physical Gameboy and the game cartridge used with it.

If you'd like to contribute, please feel free to make a donation through this same means (the 'download now' button). It will encourage me to develop other projects like this in the future.

God bless!
